item.title: Help me with automatic rank changer please :)
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

Encryption:

Well, if players had to get 1000 player kills in order to yell. They’d rather leave, just add in a timer saying you must play for one hour or vote to recieve the privilege to yell.

Yea,i was thinking that too,BUT! I still need the player kills for a rank Kuz i got the killstreak ranks and rewards already

EDIT: [quote=“Encryption, post:5, topic:534559”] just add in a timer saying you must play for one hour[/quote]

How can i find one for this :)? Btw i want it to be like a 1minute timer.

item.title: Help me with automatic rank changer please :)
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

So when you kill 1000 npcs in my server you obtain the “members” rank for your yell,but i want to change it and be 1000 player kills,instead of 1000 npc kills.How can i do this too ?

This code is when you try to type ::yell it says u need 1k npc kills,but i want it to say you need 100 player kills,just changing the npc to pk or whatevs gives an error

[code] }else if (c.playerRights == 0 && (c.npcKills >= 1000)) {
c2.sendMessage("<col=16515072><shad=16712669>[Member] “
+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +”:<col=255> “
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +”");

						}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && (c.npcKills < 1000)) {
							c.sendMessage("You must become a member," + c.npcKills + "/1000 Npc Kills."); 
						/**}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && (c.npcKills < 1000)) {
						c2.sendMessage("[Guest]"
						+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
						+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");	*/
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    }

[/code]

For the Members rank,i want them to obtain that if they kill 1k players,instead of 1k npckills

if (playerRights == 0 && (npcKills >= 1000)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; getDH().sendDialogues(28, npcType); c2.sendMessage("<shad=7534554>[PKING GAWD] " +playerName+ " has just logged in,everyone RAPE THIS PLAYER NOW!"); } } } if (playerRights == 0 && (npcKills <= 1000)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { getDH().sendDialogues(28, npcType); } } }
I searched for “npckills” everywhere and can’t find where you make your own file to do player kills instead of npc kills

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with automatic rank changer please :)
